message.name: ERR_PROVIDERMEMBEROFFERING_XRV_PROVIDEROFFERING_STATUS
message.locale: The provider offering, %1s, is not 'Active', it cannot be associated to the provider member.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERMEMBEROFFERING_XRV_ONLY_ACTIVE_PROVIDERMEMBER_CAN_BE_ASSOCIATED
message.locale: Only 'Active' provider member can be associated to the provider offering.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERMEMBEROFFERING_XRV_ALREADY_ACTIVE_PROVIDERMEMBEROFFERING_EXIST
message.locale: Already an 'Active' provider member offering exist for the provider member

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERMEMBEROFFERING_XRV_PROVIDERMEMBER_HAS_TO_MEET_TRAINING_REQUIREMENTS
message.locale: %1s has to meet the training requirements for the service(s), %2s

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERMEMBEROFFERING_XRV_STARTDATE_BEFORE_PROVIDEROFFERING_STARTDATE
message.locale: Provider Member Offering Start Date, %1d, cannot be earlier than Start Date of Provider Offering, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERMEMBEROFFERING_XRV_STARTDATE_BEFORE_PROVIDERMEMBER_STARTDATE
message.locale: Provider Member Offering Start Date, %1d, cannot be earlier than Start Date of Provider Member, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERMEMBEROFFERING_XRV_ENDDATE_AFTER_PROVIDEROFFERING_ENDDATE
message.locale: Provider Member Offering End Date, %1d, cannot be later than the End Date of Provider Offering, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERMEMBEROFFERING_XRV_ENDDATE_AFTER_PROVIDERMEMBER_ENDDATE
message.locale: Provider Member Offering End Date, %1d, cannot be later than the End Date of Provider Member, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERMEMBEROFFERING_XRV_STARTDATE_AFTER_PROVIDEROFFERING_ENDDATE
message.locale: Provider Member Offering Start Date, %1d, cannot be later than End Date of Provider Offering, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERMEMBEROFFERING_XRV_STARTDATE_AFTER_PROVIDERMEMBER_ENDDATE
message.locale: Provider Member Offering Start Date, %1d, cannot be later than End Date of Provider Member, %2d.
